title: Ketu in 1st House for Virgo Ascendant
summary: When Ketu transits the 1st house for Virgo Ascendant, identity, confidence, and self-direction turn inward. There is detachment from personal image, reduced need for validation, and a subtle loss of interest in ego-driven pursuits. Clarity about the self may feel blurred, yet intuition and inner awareness sharpen. This phase supports self-observation, simplification, and spiritual grounding, but can weaken decisiveness or visibility if isolation increases. Balance introspection with practical action to avoid withdrawal or confusion.

sections.heading: Career & Direction
points: Preference for independent or background work

closing: Ketu in the 1st house invites Virgo Ascendant to rediscover self beyond ego, balancing introspection with grounded action.
